headline: Ventas Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.48 Per Common Share
summary: CHICAGO, May 13, 2025--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.48 per common share. The dividend will be payable in cash on July 17, 2025 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on June 30, 2025.

headline: Ventas price target lowered to $71 from $72 at Scotiabank
summary: Scotiabank analyst Nicholas Yulico lowered the firm’s price target on Ventas (VTR) to $71 from $72 and keeps a Sector Perform rating on the shares. The firm is adjusting its estimates on U.S. Real Estate & REITs in its coverage following Q1 results, the analyst tells investors. Quarterly results contained some negative surprises, but generally played out as expected, with most companies maintaining FY25 guidance, the firm notes.
